description:
Tasuku digs deeper into the mystery of Doctor Gara. Gao and Bal encounter a medical student named Kaeru, who has the same Buddy monster as Gara. Kakeru helps treat Ozon B`s sickness and challenges Gao to a Buddyfight.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Here it Comes Again! Terrifying Natural Enemy, Zodiac!
マタデタァ! 恐怖の天敵ゾディアック!!
